name: lpm
short_description: The LPM Package Manager(LPM) is a powerful and simple command line driven package management system for Lightston OS and capable of installing, uninstalling, list, verifying and querying computer software packages. But it's different from other normal Linux package management system(like rpm, deb..etc), As normal, Each lpm software package consists of an archive (squashfs compressed filesystem) with information about the package like verison, a description and more. but no need on dependancies. But a standard lpm package not contain dependancy information. "(KISS)Keep It Simple Stupid" make Lightston OS more controllable and simplely easy.
summary: A powerful package management system for Lightston OS
